msg: control-chars.py: defensive coding in the error path.
(main): Gracefully handle error strings that don't match our regexp.

author: danielsh
msg: Add a hook script that rejects filenames that contain control characters.
This is needed at least for filenames that contain newlines;
tools/hook-scripts/validate-files.py can't handle those since svnlook's output
is not parseable in that case.
